name: NIGHTFALL FLORA
desc: A graceful black & multicolour floral hand embroidery dress featuring round neck, puffed sleeves, fitted waist, gathered hem and button detailing at the front.

name: ELEGANT ENIGMA
desc: A classy ethnic ensemble featuring a black kurthi in ethnic prints and stripes with a shirt collar on a V-neck and button-up flaps on the sleeve end paired with chic pencil pants with stripes at the sides.
